issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Stop using deprecated google::protobuf::MessageLite::ByteSize()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8561](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8561). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's deprecated since Protobuf 3.4.0.

https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf/blob/v3.4.0/CHANGES.txt#L58-L59

> - ByteSize() and SpaceUsed() are deprecated.Use ByteSizeLong() and
>   SpaceUsedLong() instead
